downloadTitle: White Paper: SAMPLE - Performance and Scalability Assessment of Customer Implementation
downloadDescription: This paper provides a sample final report on the results, conclusions, and recommendations from a performance and scalability assessment of a customer's implementation of Microsoft Dynamics CRM.

downloadFile.name: SAMPLE - CRM4 Performance and Scalability Assessment of Customer Implementation.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/f/5/a/f5acbd8d-0630-44dd-851a-2b86f91c5aec/SAMPLE - CRM4 Performance and Scalability Assessment of Customer Implementation.docx

detailsSection: Working closely with contacts in a variety of technical, support, and field roles, the MS CRM Engineering for Enterprise (E2) team receives documentation and resources from which the broader CRM community can benefit. This paper provides a sample final report on the results, conclusions, and recommendations from a performance and scalability assessment of a customer's implementation of Microsoft Dynamics CRM. The document provides details of the testing methodology and environment, as well as benchmark testing results. This sample report is intended to serve as a point of reference for other groups or teams that are or plan to perform similar performance and scalability assessments on customer implementations of Microsoft Dynamics CRM.
detailsSection_file_name: SAMPLE - CRM4 Performance and Scalability Assessment of Customer Implementation.docx
systemRequirementsSection: Windows Server 2003; Windows Server 2008; Windows Vista; Windows XP
installInstructionSection: To start the download, click Download, click Go, and then do one of the following: To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location. To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
